content.detailedDescription: I was waiting for my son at 25th ave and peoria across from rose mofford park. i opened the sun roof and noticed a small dot moving across the sky, then another and finally a third. i got out of the car and watched these lights for the next 20 minutes. they appeared to be very high up. when the lights banked or turned it was very sharp, acceleration and hovering were not something that you would see from a airplane or helicopter, there were no beacons or flashing lights. i am an avowed skeptic, but i have always wanted to see something like this. ultimately we just lost track of the lights. i was with a classmate of mine named troy and he saw them too,when my son came out, he saw them as well so it was nice to have witnesses. none of us could tell for sure what we were seeing.
content.summary: Observed three lights moving erratically in the night sky over north phoenix.

content.detailedDescription:
Driving home on hwy#285, southbound
clear night sky ,i noticed 3 bright lights over bailey, co.,over the national forrest.
low in sky, there were no stars out, but i saw alarge triangle shape blacked out,
the spot it stood in. the lights were in perfect alinement.
i assumed it was low stars, but there were no twinkling, and i quickly forgot about it.

the object was a very large triangle shape, the top part, pointed at an angle towards
the sky and the back lights, pointed towards east and west. it remained stationary
at all times with no movement at all.No blinking lights, or anything else.

this object and lights, could only be view southbound or westbound.
at first i wasnot concern, and assumed it was low stars, but it was way too low for stars, this was viewed over the park national forrest, and at
about 8-9000ft mountain elevation where there are no lights.

this object and lights were present for about 3 weeks, almost every night, in the same
area and about the same time from about 9:30 pm to before dawn.

i began getting up in the middle of the night ,out of curiosity, to find the lights
first, then i could see its blacked out shape, from my upstair balcony or driving
home very late at night . 
after about 3 weeks the lights and object simply disappeared.
content.summary: 3 bright lights in shape of triangle.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work at 10:10 pm.  as i crested a hill, heading south in paradise valley, i saw (from 10 miles away)  a pinkish/orange light launch from the ground straight up into the clouds.  enough of the twilight was lingering that i could see it came from the approximate neighborhood of my house.  the sighting lasted one second.  it looked like someone setting off fireworks, only it was raining and it travelled much faster than a firework.
content.summary: Pinkish light launches up into low hanging clouds.

content.detailedDescription: We were out in the desert looking at wildlife. lights appeared hovering over a distant mountain peak. lights were stationary but each of the lights appeared to be pulsating. we watched the lights for about 40 minutes and then they disappeared.
content.summary: Triangle of lights seen near gila bend.

content.detailedDescription:
I read the mufon post on almost a daily basis and noticed that there were several post in the proximity of the area i was visiting and took interest in what was happening in the skies during this period. i was up most of the night taking photos of a construction project we are working on in woodland park, colorado. 

i noticed the night the photo was taken that a strange light appeared in one of the photos. not a star, and not a typical round object. it was not until the next day when i was telling my mom about all the strange reports in colorado that i put it all together, and furthermore, that there were similar qualities to the photo that aligned with the reports. 

it could be a coincidence and just some anomaly or light reflection in the photo, but i showed it to many others and it is a very strange photo of a red light with what appears to be spikes of light to the right and left and something coming from the bottom as most of the other post indicated as well. so, i think it would be a very strange coincidence if it is nothing because it is in aline with what others posted about their siting. 

if someone is investigating the 5 post that occurred between 6-12-09 and 6-15-09 and would like to investigate the photo, please contact me and i will submit it to the investigator. 

thanks.
content.summary: Photo captured same time period as 5 other colorado posts.

content.detailedDescription:
While serving in the army (at the time 3/187 inf. of the 101st airborne division), i was participating in a field exercise in the "back 40" of ft. campbell kentucky.  during the evening hours my platoon rotated through a two man guard routine during the evening hours.  one guard was mobile and walking the perimiter of our area, the other was to man the m60 machine gun mounted on top of a 5-ton transport truck.  the truck was positioned as such that it was facing an open area about the size of a football field, but oval in shape. the duty of the gunner was to maintain the security of this open area.  as such, one has to be vigilant of all motion in this area. due to the amount of light and our operating procedure, it was necessary to be wearing our pvs-7b night vision goggles.
  during my shift as gunner i saw a saucer shaped craft emerge from over the tops of the trees at about a 2 o'clock from my position.  it moved in a semicircle until it was hovering over the cleared area to my front. during the time of it's hover, i can only estimate that the craft was no more than 100ft off of the ground. there was no question in my mind that this was a u.F.O.  i have researched since that time and have not found any other situations with the same exact circumstances.  by this i mean that, as usual the craft emitted no sound, but there were also no lights coming from the craft either.  if i had not been wearing my night vision goggles i am sure that i would not have seen the craft at all.  
   the craft was distinctly saucer shaped, but the bottom was concave in it's center, as if hollowed out partially.
   after hovering in dead silence for about 10 seconds it retreated directly away from my position in a seemingly straight line, until it finally was out of site past the tree line to my front.  
   i had always believed that u.F.O.'s existed, and had seen the odd light in the sky, but this was very close and to this day the memory is vivid and i am completely certain of what i saw that evening.
content.summary: Disc moved from right to left, hovered and then moved straight back out of view.

content.detailedDescription:
I am a former jet naval aviator and atp-certificated pilot with more than 5,200 hours total time in the air and flew in alaska for 18 years.  i grew up around aviation, as my father started the first cessna dealership in medford, oregon.

my sharp-eyed alaskan inupiat eskimo wife -- whose brother is a commercial/instrument rated, alaskan bush pilot -- was the one who actually saw the object while i was driving our audi in light traffic.  by the time i pulled into a parking lot to try and see it for myself, the low clouds obscured the almost white-colored-appearing cigar-shaped object.  riding with us was a husband and wife who are both commercial-rated helicopter pilots, but they did not see it in time, either, as there were only a few openings in the clouds to discern it.  my native alaskan wife is always the one who sees notable objects first while we're driving (like deer and other wildlife, birds, airplanes, etc.), as she has the kind of eyes (as many females do) that can immediately distinguish camouflaged objects from the surrounding scenery.

the cigar-shaped object (she described at the time as looking like "a white pencil with no eraser") appeared to be moving north to south approximately over downtown medford, oregon, and slightly west of the climbout/approach path for runway 14/32 at the medford airport; it was not at a very high altitude (perhaps a thousand feet agl slightly above the base of the low clouds) and was drifting in and out of the low clouds. she says it looked exactly like the one in this short 8 second video found on you tube at this web link:  http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=azous1etpro&feature=related

all four of us riding in the car last saturday afternoon at or about 5:50 p.M., june 13th, 2009, would be particularly interested if anybody else in medford spotted the object at that time, too.  we have absolutely no doubt that what my eskimo wife described was really what she saw -- she has always had the sharpest eyes of any of us.
content.summary: While driving along crater lake avenue near the intersection with jackson st. saw cigar-shaped object drifting in and out of low clouds.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I was standing in the doorway of my home seeing a visiting friend out the door when i was gripped by a sudden desire to look up to the sky.  it was a balmy april evening, the sky was clear and the sun had not completely disappeared in the horizon.  as i gazed at the eastern sky and cumulus cloud formations, i noticed a sphere near a large cloud.  it was moving slowly, and since i had seen this on other occasions, i suspected the sphere would go into the cloud, come out and travel a short distance away, then go back into the cloud.  i watched the circular object disappear behind the cumulus formation, but didn't see it emerge out of the cloud.  i ran back in the house and grabbed my camera binoculars to snap a photo, but never saw the sphere return to view.  i stood there for about 15 minutes waiting, ready to snap a picture, but failed to see the flying object again.  i can't figure the exact distance of my sighting, but if you can picture the distance of clouds in the sky from where you are standing, you can get an approximate idea of how far i was from this sphere.

as i mentioned above, i have seen orbs going in and out of clouds on previous occasions.  one of those times was about six years ago on my way to the philadelphia airport.  as always, whenever i spot one of these objects, be it a saucer, orb, or black, batman-looking aircraft, i get a sense of wonder and a spooky feeling that i am being watched.
content.summary: Sphere entering cloud formation.

content.detailedDescription:
This ufo flying above the mosque tower, this event exactly happen at early morning about 4.30am, when i wanna do a shubuh prayer.

its very clearly, and its my very first time to see something like that... its spin around for a while and gone... just like a light... this thing full of a light...

i can only stay still and can't move my sight at that thing...
until now..I only tell it to my friends...

and i'm so sorry i didn't take a picture of it...
content.summary: It looks like a plate.

content.detailedDescription:
We were walking on the dark beach, and witnessed flashing objects over the atlantic that looked like fireflies at first, but high altitude and high speed. intermittent flashing unlike aircraft lights. flew in square formation then random. flying in a fairly straight trajectory ne. appeared as fireball-like for a few seconds then disappeared and reappeared shortly after as the flashing lights again. repeated these actions again.

it wasn't like anything we had ever seen before. did not appear to be any aircraft that we were familiar with.

cloud cover from coming storm blocked our viewing after an hour or so.
content.summary: Flashing lights over the atlantic. fireball-like intermittently.

content.detailedDescription: i was on a flight from puerto rico to new york as we started to decend on a very cloudy and rainy fall morning i was sitting on the left side of the plane right over the wing,must people had their windows closed but mine remained open through the entire flight.I was very aware of the situation and wanted to see the entire decend.As we kept decending this acorn shaped thing just flew across the top of the plane from right to left and over the front part of the plane i took my eyes of it to see if anybody was seen what i was watching but seem to me that nobody wanted to see the aproached because all the clouds.(they probably felt uneasy)i had a very good look at it, was a dull brown color no shine what so ever,no visible windows or doors probably ten to fifteen feet across,i was on it for what i say was a minute but it could have been less,went over us and flew down and away from us, then made a fast right turn into some clouds,it was traveling quite fast,the clouds on this side of the plane were few at the time and as it flew over us it took so of a dive as it flew away to some distance,few thousand feet. i would say,because it went by the front part of the plane i know for certain that the captain of the plane and co-pilot had to see it.I did not discuss this event with other people in the plane because after the event i looked to see if any of the windows on my side were opened and could not find any, so i kept it to my self and plus not one would have belived me anyway.This did happened to me...I do swear on the bible and i'm a christian and i don't swear in vane.
content.summary: Acorn shaped, dull brown color,10 to 15 feet diameter no windows, or wings or tail.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I was driving eastbound on the 101 freeway at 3:40 pm this afternoon. i had just passed the transition to rte 23 north when i glanced out the window to my left - in the normal course of safely driving on the freeway - and saw an object in the sky. at first glance i was confused by what i saw, and thought perhaps it was an old-fashioned box-kite. it hard an overall dark appearance, but seemed to be tinged with a general kind of rusty-red color as well, but in blobs or spots, not at all uniform. i realized almost instantly that if it were a box-kite it was shaped very oddly, and there was no visible tail or line or any of the things one might normally associate with a kite. it appeared to be roughly one thousand yards away from me and perhaps 500-700 feet in altitude. i squinted, but still couldn't recognize what it was.

i turned to the passenger in the truck and asked him, "what the heck is that? do you see that?"
he had not been looking in that direction at all, and, as i turned to look back out the window again, i said, "there, in the sky... what is that?". as he tried to lean forward to get in position to see past me out the window, i was already looking back at the object and, quite impossibly it just faded into thin air. as if in a film it simply dissolved away. 

i was astonished, and immediately pulled the truck to the shoulder so that i could properly maintain a view of the exact part of the sky where this thing, this solid looking dark, oddly shaped thing had appeared to be only seconds before. there was nothing there.

this happened very quickly and i understand that my description is vague at best, but the thing seemed vague itself...I didn't understand the shape i was seeing, and i certainly didn't associate it with anything in the sky, and i sure as heck watched it fade from view in front of my very surprised (and somewhat disappointed) eyes. i wanted to know what it was, i didn't want it to disappear before i could grasp what it was.

it is my hope that someone else may have observed this and be able to offer an explanation. thanks.
content.summary: While driving on the freeway, witness observes bizarre object.

content.detailedDescription: We were having a camp fire around 11:00 pm on sat night june 13th out in the country so sky was full of stars and mostly clear when i caught something out of the the corner of my eye as i was looking at the stars. it was a set of three lights that moved very fast back and fourth in one area. i pointed it out to the other people there ( about 7 of us )and for almost 2 minutes it ( for a lack of better words ) danced in the sky. then just disappeared. we were all stunned and in disbelief at what we saw and spent the next hour or so trying to come to some conclusion as to what it was. i live in the country were sky viewing is very good and me and my boys love to look at the stars. we see satellites almost nightly and planes both high and low altitude constantly. this was neither.
content.summary: Lights moving very quick and back and forth.

content.detailedDescription:
June 10, 2009 at 8:04 p.M. 
i take photos of clouds for my art projects.  sometimes i feel literally compelled to take photos of the sky.  i looked at these photos through the view screen of my camera but didn't downloaded to my laptop until june 12, with only a cursory glance.  i later examined all the photos, on the morning of june 17, 2009.  as i examined each photo, i noticed something odd.  there "it" was, dead center of one of the frames. 

i would have missed it but the symmetry of the object drew my attention. 
the light vs. shadowing shows a perfect circle of something that is there, yet seems to be attempting to hide.  my digital camera appears to have captured the energy field around an object?

this object is not a speck of dust, drop of moisture, insect, or light anomaly and does not appear in any other frames, before or after.

description: as i recall, i was facing east and the object would have been approx. 70-75 degrees above the horizon.  the weather was quite warm.  a thunderstorm had just passed and another was approaching from the west.

i am attaching an adjusted and cropped version, with this report.  the original, untouched photo is safely filed away and i have sent a copy of it to a mufon fi (teresa turner), who is handling another case.
thank you.
content.summary: Taking photos and in one frame i captured the outline of a circular object.

content.detailedDescription: I had taken my dog outside to have a cigar and about halfway through my cigar i started to notice flickers and flashes of light in both crescent shapes and orbs.  there was cloud cover but no thunderstorms.  the light seemed to be both in the cloud at times and also under the clouds.  did not even loosely resemble lightning.  as i watched this very lengthy light show, i was aware of a passing car.  my dog then began to get unnerved and looked in the same direction as i was looking. as the car came closer down the road, across the street i noticed a pair of eyes as if an animal's eyes were reflecting in the light except they were a deep purple/indigo.  as the car passed i watched the spot where i had observed the eyes and was shocked to see a whitish humanoid shape stand up and quickly walk into the neighboring yard across the street.  my heart began to race and i became quite unnerved.  i called my wife outside and told her what i'd seen and asked her to look at the lights in the sky as well.  she confirmed that something was flickering/flashing in multiple spots.  we both got very nervous and came inside the house.  as i write this, my heart is still pounding in my chest.  all through this episode the dog also was alert and cautious raising and lower her head as she watched something more that we couldn't see across the street. also, i heard a jet pretty low with a loud roaring sound afterwards.
content.summary: Witnessed a crescent shaped light and multiple smaller orbs in the night sky.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my best friend were ready with our work in an art achitecture construction, so we decided to go to the central square, as usuall when e have nothing else to do, it was almost night but still a bit clear, it was cloudy, and i dont know why looked to the sky and sow two lights blue and red, like the airplanes ones, and i asked my friend what was taht and she says is an airplane  but then i realized tht they werent moving but suddenly they moved but  way too slow for being an airplane, so i stood quite, and told my friend that i wanted to be sure that that was an airplane, and started telling her that it was moving too slow and not like an airplane does, but she didnt believe me until it changed it direction and came closer to us the closer it was the more it whowed it shape it was transparent but one could see perfectly the shape,it was exactly above us with its triangular shape really close,, my friend couldnt believe it,  as it was going away i run and started jumping like making signals to them i wanted to be seen, i dont know if other people sow the place was wit a lot of people we were in the middle of the street in the central part of the city. i called one friend to wathc the sky but he was too far, we sow it til it dissapear, my freind was kinda in shock cuz she always said she didnt beleive in it, i do so i tried to explain a bit, a sensation of wellness came to me i was extremely happy, i sow some ufo���s before but never so close and with so many persons, i regreted myself not havin a camera cuz it was really near.
content.summary: An ufo came direct over us very low and showed its shape clearly.

content.detailedDescription: I was preparing for bed and decided to have a cigarette out on my patio, when i noted an circular object in the sky to my right. at first i thought it was an airplane,though it looked strange, ie the lights were twirling around the aircraft unlike a plane. then i focus carefully and became slightly frighten, but thought to myself, "you have seen this before approx. 30 years ago in wickliffe,ohio and the aircraft back then just hovered above my car while i was parking or driving into my drive way and no harm came to my children or myself. so, i just peered at it while it moved side to side for approx. 2 to 3 minutes, then it zoomed away.
content.summary: Circular saucer shape w/lights around the  bottom edge rotating, and moving side to side.

content.detailedDescription:
I was working in the construction of "第二東名高速道路" (daini-tomei expressway) at shizuoka city, province of shizuoka, japan.
while i was leaving shizuoka city, in the direction of fujieda (my based hometown), i saw in the sky, something like a star, it was very strange, because at 17:00 i have never saw anything like that in the sky! 

ok, i took the rote 1 (by-pass), and that strange object still was in the sky. i went the whole way in the by-pass looking into the sky and that bright object, when i leaved one of many tunnels in this by-pass, "we" (me and my colleague) saw a black ufo !!!

sorry, my english is not good, but i will try to explain how it looks like...
it was about 6 meter length, by 1.5 meter height, totally black and disc as shape.

i could observe that it wasn't a perfect "circle/disc" shape, as it had 4 faced very slighty .

i will use these videos to relate it formats: http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=kjy0cmp1qii (it appears at 06:32)
and with a mix of this http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=nyweaj2c8eo
now imagine this solar ballon bigger (6 meter length by 1.5 meter  height), and its corner more roundish, almost forming a circle disc.

this object was floating about 15 meter above the ground, and 20 meters away the by-pass. in a place without access!

i know what is a solar balloon, and that definitively was not the case!!!

its shape haven't any signal of seam, screw/bolt, door, window, engine (no sound), and doens't look that transparent plastic as solar ballon is.

that ufo was more like black metallic very polish bright !!!


notes:
when i got in my "real home" (here in okazaki-shi, province of aichi-ken) in the next weekend,  i could checked on stellarium [http://www.Stellarium.Org/] that, in that day and that hour and place, there was not to be any star or planet!!!

the first object was visible the whole time, and that black ufo for about 40 secounds.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo in shizuoka-ken, japan?

content.detailedDescription:
this written report was submitted to rufos (roundtown ufo society)circleville,oh by the witness. i am their f.I. also.This event happened in the fall of 1970.I will write the personal account exactly as submitted by the witness:
football season 1970-going to lancaster,ohio-just turned off 159 to 22 to lancaster-in fork of hills on right-saw headlights (bright)coming toward st.Rt.22 did not seem like it came at a high rate of speed.Got closer finally was over our car.Just seemed to stay over our car.No noise quite large.We traveled approx 2 miles and it just went back over hillside on left of 22. when we got inside lancaster.Pulled up beside police cruiser and told them what we saw. they acted like they did not believe us.
content.summary: 30' gray metalic circular object with blue,red,green,yellow  round lights on its bottom

content.detailedDescription: At 1:55 a.M. on the morning of june 16 i was sitting on my balcony which faces north. i was looking at the sky when i saw a craft suddenly appear as if out of thin air, or extremely fast. it hovered for a few seconds, then turned eastward and started accelerating, at which point i could see its full shape. it was a rectangle shaped craft which resembled a brick and emitted a very unusual light-brown glow. it had no wings, no tail, or any other features to suggest that this was an airplane. it had no lights anywhere on the craft, and was only visible from this dull glow that it emitted. the approximate size of the craft was 1000-1200 feet in length, about 500-600 feet wide, and about 250 feet tall. it made no noise and was totally silent as it accelerated quickly to the east at a speed at least twice as fast as a commercial airliner, i would estimate about 1200-1400 mph. approximate altitude of the object was 8000-12000 feet. it accelerated to the east and vanished.
content.summary: Brick-like rectangle.

content.detailedDescription:
Sighting time: 10:50 pm 
day/night: nighttime 
no. of witnesses: one 
duration: 20 seconds 
 


  
summary:  nine to twelve fat boomerang shaped objects closely spaced together flying north, ominously silent and dark metallic in color, without any visible lights. 

at 10:50 pm before going to bed on monday december 13th 2004, i wanted to catch sight of at least a couple of the geminids meteors. it was their peak viewing night. it was a brilliantly clear and essentially moonless night, painfully crisp and cold. the sky was not a dark black, but a luminous satiny rich dark royal blue. i walked east on my driveway towards my back yard. a large, dark gray shadowy mass flying north, immediately caught my eyes. i focused on what appeared to be at least nine to twelve fat boomerang shaped objects, more accurately; these were kidney bean shaped objects, closely spaced and asymmetrical in formation. without a sound these objects smoothly glided across the sky. these objects were dark, not a glimmer of light on any of them. i was only able to view them for 15 to 20 seconds, when my neighbor's tree obscured my view. i ran around like a maniac trying to catch an other glimpse, but i did not. they were not flying at a high rate of speed, but in a steady calculated manner. these objects were not clouds, migrating birds of stealth bombers as family and friends have volunteered. 
 

i am a mature pragmatic woman, that acknowledges that we live in wondrous universe which we know very little about. 

i have reported this to an other ufo website after it happened, but today i decided to include my sighting to mufon and to specifically the missouri site. it's been almost five years and i still think about this experience frequently.
content.summary: Nine to twelve fat metallic boomerang shaped objects, no lights, no sound.

content.detailedDescription: At about 11:45 am, june 14, 2009 i stepped out of church and looked into the western sky and saw several "v" shaped contrails. these were obviously not a natural occurance and it was difficult to conceive that conventional jet aircraft could have turned this sharp. there were no aircraft in view when i observed these contrails. i took a picture with my cell phone (nokia 6555). sacramento international airport is about 10 miles away, in the direction i was facing.
content.summary: "v" shaped contrails...

content.detailedDescription:
A glimmer of light caught my eye from my kitchen and i caught 5 photos from inside the window. these show ta star pattern which is the screen reflecting, so i went outside and investigated. i could see this light with the unaided eye for over twenty minutes, taking pics for ten. this object seemed to be between me and the bushes, but if i went towards it, it vanished. it would return when i gave some room. the pics i took, and two videos are all with different settings and focus for a variety of views. it was flashing so some don't show it as intense as others.

the avi files i included are probably the best evidence of what i actually saw. i went over to the bushes multiple times and found nothing which could explain these lights. my wife, and best friend also investigated after i showed them the photos and videos i am sending you, all without any explanatory findings 

i dont know what this is, but it is weird.



thank you.

jimi hughes

ps, i am available for contact, but only through confirmation by mufon reps. i do not want 3rd party reps calling my house directly.
content.summary: A light in my yard in the bushes 7 am june 9, 2009.

content.detailedDescription: 1 was on a delta airlines flight with my wife and two of my children from new york to manchester england. they were sat on the left hand side of the aircraft i was sat on the right hand side in the aisle seat. we were on the landing aproach ,the seatbelt signs were on as we were descending i wanted to look out the window but felt uncomfortable looking to my right as there were two people sat next to me and so i tried to look accross the aisle where my wife and children were sitting but they were not interested and i could not see for there heads so i looked through the window on the next row back accross the aisle. i saw what i thought was the airport radio watch tower and i thought wow we are just about to land i looked at it as we went past but we did not land, in fact we were still just above the lower cloud cover ,as soon as i realized what was happening i froze and could not speak for the shock. we landed about fifteen minutes later. the object was a circular disc it was about two hundred yards away and on a level with us, it was about twenty to twenty five feet in diameter and its depth was around six to seven feet, it was metalic grey with horizontal lines which i thought were windows ,when i first thought it was the radio tower. i think it was stationary as i could not see after we went past. my family did not see it but i dont know about any other passengers as i said nothing for total shock. because of how i was positioned when i viewed the object it is possible that no one else saw it because i was looking back though the row behind me window at an angle that no one else was probably looking they would be looking foreward through their own windows iwas looking backwards through the row behind window. i have only spoke of this sighting to my family but feel troubled by it.
content.summary: Sighting of  a metal disc during flying within a aircraft.

content.detailedDescription: My puppy morgan would not stop barking,so i went outside to check on him. i brought him into the house and he kept on barking ,facing the back towards the west. i took hom back outside and he went to the front coner of my garden and i follow him .I could not see anything because trees were in my way so i move to the fencenear the dog houses so i could get a clearer view of the field behind my house. i than notice a beatiful bright white bluish star. i was watching it,then all of sudden aonther star dropped out of it. it wobble as it dropped,and then became stationary.It was a reddish orange color star. seem smaller then the white bluish star. i had my hands on the fence as i was watching this din't think i could release the fence. the white bluish star begin to more towards the east, coming almost over my back yard. it then shoot up an diappear into space. i then turn my attention to the reddish orange star, and it begin to move towards me. it moved much slower than the white star.I begin to back away from the fence to get closer to my back door.I was between the dog houses and back porch and it seem to slow down more as it got over my back yard. i observe the star trying to see a shape but could not make out one. i then notice a low humming sound coming from the reddish star. at this point i did not know what i should do so i wave to it.I let my arm drop down, and then i waved again and said goodbye and the star took off towards the east into space and disappear just like the white star. my puppy stop barking and my older dog did not bark but he was more hyper then he normally is. before all this happen i was doing dishes i think, i really don't remember what i was doing at the time. i know i needed to check on my puppy and see what had him barking. i did know and don't understand why i knew it was not another animal my dog was barking at.I do know the humming seem to bother me and i feel lost for some reason.I do know that when i moved away from my garden to get a better view i look up, and there was the star in the sky,but i knew it was not a star. i had no fear.Even with my actions of getting closer to my back door ,there was no fear in me.The only wittnesses i had was my 2 dogs and they are not talking.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Dog was barking went out to check on him saw bright white bluish star, and one star drop out of white star.

content.detailedDescription:
I'm a ufo fanatic in a true sense of the word. when i think about it, i look out to see if there's any unique objects in the sky. earlier today, i noticed one object that i'm now believing to be a star, but when i got my video camera to film it, i noticed a previously unseen object next to it that changed shape numerous times. this second object was grey in color and partially transparent. the second object did not move, but was in its place. after roughly three minutes, i had zoomed out on the video to please disbelievers that it wasn't some flashlight on a wall. when i zoomed back in, using the first object as a guiding point, the second object had disappeared.

i have video if available, but i cannot transfer it to my laptop at this time (no firewire cable). if interviewed, i will bring the video camera.
content.summary: Two objects; one may have been a star (unsure); other changed shape constantly.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription:
This is an entirely true sighting.  i am not exaggerating any parts, and i am giving the best record of the incident even though it happened four years ago.

june 23, 2005
western pennsylvania
around midnight, possibly even a little into the next morning

my friend k (i will call her k for now, as i am unsure whether or not she would prefer to be named) had a bonfire that night.  it was a summer night before our senior year in highschool, and the skies were clear.  there was no alcohol nor any mind-altering substance at the bonfire.  most everyone had left, and k and i were left to tend to the fire, and we were just star-gazing and relaxing.

we both noticed a light in the sky.  it was circular/spherical, high in the air above us, and it was pulsating.  because of how high in the air the object appeared, it was impossible to tell how big it really was.  you could tell that it was not a star, and it was, in fact, within our atmosphere.  it was not stationary like a star, and it did not follow a set trajectory like a shooting/falling star.  i could tell that it was not an airliner because of the way that airliner's light up with three blinks, and this object only had one on-going pulsation.

instead, as the object flashed, it moved in an irregular pattern.  i would describe the flight pattern as almost a random zig-zag: not a fixed back-and forth motion.  the angles that this object moved on were too acute to be executed by any aircraft that i have ever seen.

this went on for probably two minutes or so, the object pulsating and moving irregularly, before it finally disappeared.

i considered everything it could be.  yet, i was able to immediately rule out an airliner or shooting star, or even a stationary star.  i also considered it to be a lightning bug, but then again the object was definitely too high up and too large to be an insect.  although before i said it was "impossible" to tell how large the ufo was, i know that it was too large to be a lightning bug - the emphasis is that it was a bigger object.

k and i both witnessed this incident, and every time i ask her if we really saw it, she confirms my second-guessing.  once you see something unbelievable it is natural to question your own credibility.

i did not feel threatened or intimidated by the object.  it did not seem to be aware of us watching it, as it was high in the sky, and it did not seem to want to use any camoflauge besides the cover of darkness at night.  if anything, i was and still am curious to discover what it was, and if it really was an et craft.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Flashing object, irregular flight pattern; not airliner, not star.

content.detailedDescription:
I just remembered an event that occured last summer while watching a severe thunderstorm blow through our area. the most recent thunderstorms we've been having this year rekindled this memory.

it was late in the summer, august from what i can remember. i was looking out my glass doors off the deck watching a strong storm pass through. it was very windy and there was alot of inter cloud lightning. i was amazed while watching this storm, the clouds were moving exceptionally fast and the torrential rain was somewhat subsiding even though the lightning strikes and wind were intensifying.

this is when i noticed a blinking white light zooming in and around the clouds. i immediately thought, "oh my god what is that plane doing in this storm?!" as the "blinking light" got closer i noticed it was round and in between the flashes of lightning and it's blink-glow, the object was silvery and shiney...Almost reflective from the lightning flashes.
i was amazed, a little frightened and a little upset that my husband wasn't home to confirm what i had just seen.

the duration of veiwing this object was approximately 5 minutes or so. it followed along with the storm, flying in and out of the cloud cover.I watched it until i could no longer see it.
i can honestly say that i've heard people mention "ball lightning"-this certainly was an object, a metallic round object.

i have recently posted a sighting from the same backyard location in upstate ny where i saw a similiar shaped object, only quite a bit larger, still round and silver. this sighting was not during a storm but seen on a bright cloudless sunny day. same area, but moving in a different direction.
content.summary: White round blinking object seen zooming in and out of thunderstorm.

content.detailedDescription: I lived in las vegas at the time, and was sitting in my room, which incedentaly was pointed toward the mountain ranges..It was about 11pm and i saw a very bright light hovering.. it just seemed to sit there.. then very eraticaly it made a number of very fast, and very precise maneuvers. it went up, down, left, right, horizontal etc.. but always seemed to be in a for lack of a better word, a box i suppose, in other words it allways stayed within this physical space. i watched this for probably 20-30 minutes, and it finally shot off almost instantly upwards..I realize that area 51 is right there, and it was certainly in that vacinity. that said, i dont know if it was "alien" or if it is a very advanced air craft that the us has designed, and built.. either way, i have never again seen anything in the sky behave in that manner.. it was truly awe inspiring.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Erratic flying, up, down, left right, very fast, very precise.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my 2nd floor bathroom when i decided to look outside and see what the weather could be like when i saw this object flying from the north east, with my window facing directly east. my neighbors house litterely right up next to mine i was able to just see it come over and fly at about several hundred feet up and a quarter mile away moving south. it was closest from when it came from ne it just appeared round and white could not make any distinguishable marks no wings no propelers no sound. it was very small and very far away. it moved slowly away moving against the wind. and sometimes just stationary. at one point a airliner flew just right by it as though the pilot did not see it. i am usure just what it is but a least i took a few photos using a binocular with a camera a regular camera could not make it out as it was to far away.
content.shape: Diamond,  Disc,  Egg,  Flash,  Sphere,  Star-like,  Other,  Unknown
content.summary: Star like object moving on its own across the sky.
